detail_desc: Ankle-length chinos in a soft cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and fake back pockets with a button. Tapered legs with creases.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif and fringes on the front.
Hair elastics with bows and shiny plastic beads at the ends. No metal clips.
Trousers in soft jersey made from a viscose and organic cotton blend with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy. Straight legs that flare to the hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a sewn-in turn-up with a rubber appliqué at the front.
Fitted, V-neck top in lace with long sleeves and a raw-edge, scalloped trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with short cap sleeves and wide ribbing around the neckline.
Dress in cotton piqué with a collar, button placket and embroidery detail on the chest. Short sleeves with ribbed trims, a seam at the waist and an A-line skirt.
Round-necked jersey T-shirt in a cotton blend.
Jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and a longer layer in woven fabric at the hem, designed to look like the bottom of a shirt.

V-neck playsuit in a viscose weave with lace details, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the neckline and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with wrapover sides. Unlined.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave. Regular waist with elastication at the back, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the front in a relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted top in a soft rib knit with a V-neck front and back and long sleeves.

Jumper in a soft cotton knit with a lined hood and long raglan sleeves. Zip at the top that continues around the edges of the hood, a kangaroo pocket and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Shirt in cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Knee-length shorts in lightweight stretch cotton twill with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist. Side pockets, a welt back pocket and shaping seams at the knees.
3/4-length running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with ventilating mesh sections on the legs. High, elasticated waist with a concealed drawstring and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Pre-tied bow tie with a matching handkerchief. Bow tie with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm. Size of handkerchief 33x33 cm.
Fully lined swimsuit with an all-over print, gold-coloured appliqué, narrow shoulder straps and frill trim at the top.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric. Slightly longer at the back.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a ribbed collar, buttons at the top and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Short, padded jacket with a jersey-lined hood and stand-up collar with a drawstring. Zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, one inner pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Quilted lining.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in a textured organic cotton weave with an elasticated waist and adjustable straps that cross and fasten with concealed buttons at the back. Lined.
Short, fitted dress in jersey crêpe. Straight cut at the top, wide shoulder straps and a short slit at the hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft knit in a slightly wider style with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved nightdress in printed jersey with a button placket, ribbed cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with terry appliqués. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and tapered legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Shorts in glossy, pleated jersey with wide, covered elastication at the waist and short, wide legs with laser-cut edges at the hems.
Off-the-shoulder, calf-length dress in ribbed jersey with a sheen. Elastication and a flounce at the top, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt.
Top in soft, airy slub jersey with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and long sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a peplum.
Short, large necklace in metal with sparkly stones and an adjustable fastener. Length 41 cm.
Glasses case in imitation leather with an imitation suede lining. Flap with a reinforced front and press-stud fastening. Size 6x16 cm.
Flounced skirt in a stretch weave. Wrapover front with ties at one side and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.
Cap in cotton twill with embroidery on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, back pockets and short slits at the hems.

Lightly padded jacket in wind- and water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a faux fur trim. Diagonal zip down the front and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with sparkly stones in a loose fit. High waist, low crotch and button fly.
Top in a soft, gently draping silk and cotton blend with gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit socks in soft chenille yarn with elasticated tops.
Fully lined patterned bikini. Top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Bottoms with a decorative bow at the sides.
Joggers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated, ribbed drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains in various designs, one with a pendant. Adjustable length, 38-46 cm.
Metal earrings in various designs. Size approx. 0.3-1.2 cm.
Padded velvet Alice band.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and soles.
Long-sleeved dress in soft sweatshirt fabric with narrow ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, a welt back pocket and tapered legs with creases.
Waistcoat in washed denim with embroidery on the back and torn-off buttons. Collar, flap chest pockets, frayed armholes an a cut-off hem.
Set with a top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey with a print motif. Long-sleeved top with a tie-front hem. Matching skinny leggings with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a brushed finish. Long raglan sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted tube dress in ribbed cotton jersey with narrow elastication at the top.
Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in narrow-wale corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Elasticated, fabric-covered scrunchies.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar with a drawstring, and a V-shaped opening at the front.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Knitted top in a relaxed fit with a wide neckline and dropped shoulders.
Platform hi-tops in cotton canvas with lacing and a tongue at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles. Platform 4 cm.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a motif. Buttons on one shoulder, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Playsuit in soft lace with a frill at the top and narrow shoulder straps. Elasticated seam with a decorative bow at the waist, and short legs. Jersey lining.
Scarf in softly draping, patterned silk. Size 100x100 cm.
Swim pants and top in UV-protective fabric. Printed top with short raglan sleeves. Pants with an elasticated waist and lined gusset. UPF 50.
Bikini briefs in lace with a low waist with narrow wrapover straps at the top, a lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved, fine-knit top with a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Cardigan in a soft rib knit with a round neck, buttons down the front and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

prod_name: CA Hugh Linen shirt TVP R
detail_desc: Shirt in washed linen with a cutaway collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Leggings in stretch denim with elastication and a press-stud at the waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist and skinny legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and ribbed hems.
Reversible bucket hat in cotton twill with one patterned side and one side in a solid colour. Embroidered eyelets at each side.

Lightweight jacket in a patterned weave made from recycled polyester with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Long raglan sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs, front pockets, and elastication at the hem. Lined.

Soft body in lace and mesh with lace cap sleeves and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, a high cut at the back, and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Short-sleeved, stretch shirt in a premium cotton blend with a narrow, turn-down collar. Slim fit – a fitted style with shaping seams at the back.
Trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Imitation leather linings, fabric insoles and rubber soles.
V-neck cardigan in a soft rib knit with buttons down the front and long trumpet sleeves.
